description.value: Your durian crab curls itself up tightly, taking the shape of a ball. It then launches itself with its powerful claw at a target within 20 feet. When it lands, it makes a claw Strike, except the damage is bludgeoning instead of piercing. On a hit, the target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} for 1 round and the Strike deals an additional @Damage[1d8[untyped]] damage, or 2d8 additional damage if your crab is specialized.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Tian Xia Character Guide
